医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
博物馆蝇和野生标本有助于填补果蝇进化的空白美国斯坦福大学的 Bernard Kim 及其同事在 7 月 18 日出版的开放获取期刊 PLOS Biology 上报告称，大量新的基因组序列数据填补了果蝇生命树的主要空白。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Museum-flies-and-wild-specimens-help-fill-gaps-in-fruit-fly-evolution.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Museum-flies-and-wild-specimens-help-fill-gaps-in-fruit-fly-evolution.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b23c03c-d584-4ecb-a2fb-d0114e9ddd08 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 00:17:44 -0400 Museum flies and wild specimens help fill gaps in fruit fly evolution
研究检查了几分钟和几小时内的大脑活动和时间感知有没有听过一句古老的格言：当你玩得开心时，时间过得真快？内华达大学拉斯维加斯分校研究人员团队的一项新研究表明，这个比喻有很多道理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/UNLV-study-examines-brain-activity-and-time-perception-over-minutes-and-hours.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/UNLV-study-examines-brain-activity-and-time-perception-over-minutes-and-hours.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1bd12269-0810-48e5-9d40-fe97d6731540 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 00:04:00 -0400 Study examines brain activity and time perception over minutes and hours
Sequence Biotech LLC 承担 Sorenson 台式移液器的全面分销Sequence Biotech LLC 很高兴地宣布，我们已经接管了我们的旗舰产品 Precision 系列 96 通道台式移液器（之前的品牌为“Sorenson 台式移液器”）的全面分销。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Sequence-Biotech-LLC-assumes-full-distribution-of-Sorenson-Benchtop-Pipettor.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Sequence-Biotech-LLC-assumes-full-distribution-of-Sorenson-Benchtop-Pipettor.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f45df216-24d9-4f93-b187-f75412bd96aa Fri, 19 Jul 2024 00:04:00 -0400 Sequence Biotech LLC assumes full distribution of Sorenson Benchtop Pipettor
裸盖菇素重新配置大脑网络，显示出持久治疗效果的潜力研究人员发现，高剂量裸盖菇素会显着破坏大脑功能连接，特别是在默认模式网络中，其持久影响与治疗效果相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Psilocybin-reconfigures-brain-networks-showing-potial-for- permanent-therapeutic-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Psilocybin-reconfigures-brain-networks-showing-potential-for- permanent-therapeutic-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6135c8d7-3e4e-4b64-bba7-587ce5bac84c Thu, 18 Jul 2024 23:37:00 -0400 Psilocybin reconfigures brain networks, showing potential for lasting therapeutic effects
新型肽 PEPITEM 有望对抗“炎症”一种名为 PEPITEM 的天然肽可以潜在地恢复老年人的免疫反应并防止“炎症”，人们普遍认为“炎症”是许多与年龄相关的疾病的根本原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Novel-peptide-PEPITEM-shows-promise-in-fighting-inflammaging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Novel-peptide-PEPITEM-shows-promise-in-fighting-inflammaging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93f31b82-3cae-4794-8bc2-a2624392ce9d Thu, 18 Jul 2024 23:19:00 -0400 Novel peptide PEPITEM shows promise in fighting 'inflammaging'
极端天气与错过初级保健预约的比例较高有关德雷塞尔大学研究人员最近在《美国预防医学杂志》上发表的一项研究表明，由于全球气候变化日益严重，极端气温变得越来越频繁，这与错过初级保健预约的比例较高有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Extreme-weather-linked-with-higher-rates-of-missed-primary-care-appointments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Extreme-weather-linked-with-higher-rates-of-missed-primary-care-appointments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20a8da78-f46e-4a1a-97cb-0abbee44309b Thu, 18 Jul 2024 23:16:17 -0400 Extreme weather associated with higher rates of missed primary care appointments
美国零售鸡肉中多重耐药沙门氏菌菌株的增加沙门氏菌感染是美国的一个主要公共卫生问题，每年导致超过 130 万人患病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Rise-of-multidrug-pressive-Salmonella-strains-in-US-retail-chicken-meat.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Rise-of-multidrug-pressive-Salmonella-strains-in-US-retail-chicken-meat.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f8ede70-a808-4f47-b7e2-06f25367ada2 Thu, 18 Jul 2024 22:56:00 -0400 Rise of multidrug-resistant Salmonella strains in U.S. retail chicken meat
大脑活动模式可预示 24 小时癫痫发作风险加州大学旧金山分校团队发现，大脑活动模式可以在癫痫发作前 24 小时预示癫痫发作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Brain-activity-patterns-can-foreshadow-24-hour-seizure-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Brain-activity-patterns-can-foreshadow-24-hour-seizure-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=560cf51b-b6c9-400e-9173-a486aaff1b36 Thu, 18 Jul 2024 22:38:44 -0400 Brain activity patterns can foreshadow 24-hour seizure risk
FDA 批准 lifileucel：肿瘤浸润淋巴细胞治疗晚期黑色素瘤的里程碑美国食品和药物管理局最近批准了 lifileucel，这是第一个针对晚期黑色素瘤的商业化肿瘤浸润淋巴细胞 (TIL) 疗法，标志着癌症治疗的重大突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/FDA-approval-of-lifileucel-A-milestone-in-tumor-infiltating-lymphocyte-therapy-for-advanced-melanoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/FDA-approval-of-lifileucel-A-milestone-in-tumor-infiltating-lymphcyto-therapy-for-advanced-melanoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4946c092-6502-4376-a047-4df6b905d04c Thu, 18 Jul 2024 22:31:48 -0400 FDA approval of lifileucel: A milestone in tumor-infiltrating lymphocyte therapy for advanced melanoma
疫苗和病毒变化将长期新冠病毒风险降低了 50%，但 Omicron 仍然构成威胁研究表明，疫苗接种和时间变化显着降低了 SARS-CoV-2 感染后急性后遗症的发生率，但在 Omicron 时代仍然存在很大的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Vaccines-and-virus-changes-cut-long-COVID-risk-by-5025-but-Omicron-still-poses-a-threat.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Vaccines-and-virus-changes-cut-long-COVID-risk-by-5025-but-Omicron-still-poses-a-threat.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31a0c3dc-0120-4066-b94d-29c619d7b2eb Thu, 18 Jul 2024 21:54:00 -0400 Vaccines and virus changes cut long COVID risk by 50%, but Omicron still poses a threat
